title: String Is Lowercase
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of checking if a given string is in lowercase or not using JavaScript. We will learn about the String.prototype.toLowerCase() method, which is used to convert a given string to lowercase. By the end of this lab, you will be able to write a function that checks if a string is in lowercase or not.

meta.title: Mastering Lowercase String Checking in JavaScript
meta.description: Explore the JavaScript function to check if a given string is in lowercase, with practical examples and step-by-step guidance.
meta.keywords: string manipulation, javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, programming tutorial, javascript lab, lowercase, javascript tutor, string

verify.name: Verify Node Command History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 字符串是否为小写
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探讨如何使用JavaScript检查给定字符串是否为小写。我们将了解用于将给定字符串转换为小写的String.prototype.toLowerCase()方法。在本实验结束时，你将能够编写一个函数来检查字符串是否为小写。

meta.title: 掌握JavaScript中的小写字符串检查
meta.description: 探索用于检查给定字符串是否为小写的JavaScript函数，并提供实际示例和逐步指导。
